item.title: This Week at Remap
item.content:encoded:
18 hours and 49 minutes. I cannot remember the last time I spent so much time on a single game this fast. It's just not how my life is built these days. I realize the phrase is overused, but when I am not playing Silksong, I am thinking about playing Silksong. When I loaded up the game to check my hour count for this post, I thought about playing a few minutes. (I did not.) As the Chicago Bears spat in my face for the millionth time this weekend, I joked to a friend that we should just both grab our Switches and play Silksong instead. It would have been a better use of my time, time that would have been respected by such a lovingly crafted hellworld. Send me back into the nightmare, coach!

-pk, who accidentally made it to act two without fighting Last Judge, but the road to making that happen was itself a path paved with death

  • PODCAST: HOA – The first 15 minutes of this podcast is one of the funnier "wait, what are you talking about" moments that's ever been in a podcast between Rob and I, and at this point we've recorded a lot of podcasts together.
  • STREAM: Steam Vent – It's time to head back into the random game mines.
  • ARTICLE: Remap Recommends – It's been a minute, we're back to it.
  • STREAM: The Wheel of GeForce NOW – Do we finally World of Tanks?
  • PODCAST: Remap Radio – Is it finally time for me to unpack the 40+ hours of Donkey Kong Bananza I've played, only to end up at "I think that's mid"?
  • ARTICLE: Letter Series – Topic TBD!
